product_name: CliniqueDramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+ For Face
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingDramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+ For Face is Clinique's best-selling face moisturizer. Dermatologist-developed; helps strengthen skin's moisture barrier.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Very Dry to Dry Combination (Types 1, 2).Silky face lotion delivers 8-hour hydration.Slips on easily, absorbs quickly.Helps strengthen skin's own moisture barrier so more moisture stays in. Skin that holds onto moisture has a youthful-looking glow.Create great skin with Clinique's twice-daily 3-Step Skincare System developed by a celebrated dermatologist.It's simple: cleanse with Facial Soap, exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, moisturize with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+ or oil-free Gel. Each step is customized for your skin type.Dermatologist tested.Non-acnegenic.Allergy testedBuilt on Dermatological Science: As a dermatologist-guided brand, Clinique's commitment to safety starts with skincare science. Clinique partners with the best minds in dermatology and formulate for all skin types, tones, concerns - in service of all skin.Key IngredientsSunflower seed cake, barley extract, and cucumber fruit extract help strengthen skin's barrier, improve its resiliency, and balance and retain skin's moisture levels.Hyaluronic acid acts as a natural moisture magnet/humectant.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesDenatured alcoholSLSSLESSulfatesFragranceItem 2261902How To UseSpread moisturizer all over face/throat twice daily, or where needed. For best results, use after All About Clean Liquid Facial Soap Mild and Clarifying Face Lotion 2IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Mineral Oil / Paraffinum Liquidum / Huile Minérale, Glycerin, Petrolatum, Stearic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Oil, Urea, Lanolin Alcohol, Triethanolamine, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract / Extrait D'Orge, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seedcake, Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Trisodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Yellow 6 (CI 15985), Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Red 33 (CI 17200).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Spread moisturizer all over face/throat twice daily, or where needed. For best results, use after All About Clean Liquid Facial Soap Mild and Clarifying Face Lotion 2
ingredients: Mineral Oil / Paraffinum Liquidum / Huile Minérale

reviews.headline: I will continue buying this
reviews.comments: I have used this for many years and will continue to use

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: I never had a lotion that hydrates my face like this. I love it. This may be a lotion I buy over and over again .

reviews.headline: I would buy the product again sndcagain
reviews.comments: This all I can use on my face

reviews.headline: Love this moisturizer!
reviews.comments: Great product the moisturizer keeps my face moisturizer and vibrant the entire day. My face looks beautiful and more natural!

reviews.headline: Love this moisturizer!
reviews.comments: I  use this moisturizer year round. I have combination skin and this is perfect for me. It doesn't leave my skin greasy or oily.

reviews.headline: Moisture without greasy
reviews.comments: a new staple

reviews.headline: Are these new items?
reviews.comments: I ordered two lotions and they arrived without original packaging boxes, which makes me hard to trust if these are new items. I've been using this lotion for years and never had them without Clinique packaging when I ordered from Clinique. I went to a local store to request an exchange, and they said jumbo size does not come in boxes. However, I clearly remember that when I ordered a jumbo size from other stores including Clinique, I received it sealed and packaged in a box. This is my first time ordering through Ulta and I'm hugely disappointed.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: Have been using this moisturizer for many years and love it as much today as when I first started using it!  Keeps my face feeling smooth and hydrated and never feels heavy or greasy.

reviews.headline: Holy Grail OG
reviews.comments: I recall using Clinique brand starting skin care as a teen. Clean ingredients and easy three step process. The moisturizer is unmatched and a must overt the cetaphil brand

reviews.headline: I enjoyed
reviews.comments: Thanks

reviews.headline: Not great
reviews.comments: I applied to my face & neck for 2 days, & broke out in a rash, didn't change anything else, still itchy after 5 days.. I checked the ingredients and noticed there is dyes in there.. my fault for not checking ingredients I guess.

reviews.headline: Ruined my skin
reviews.comments: skin has been covered in red, itchy, burning rashes after two uses. had to go to the walk in urgent care for relief, skin is still extremely dry and itchy

reviews.headline: Good layering moisturizer for your western vacation
reviews.comments: So i spent a week out west with my husband and if youve ever been out west you know how that the air and heat shrivel up the moisture content in your skin and turn you into a crepey corpse. Well it did for me haha i love this as a first step moisturizer before i go in with a second thicker one. This has urea wich is amazing for crepey skin!

reviews.headline: Highly recommend it
reviews.comments: I have been using this moisturizer for years and still obsessed with it

reviews.headline: Ok moisturizer
reviews.comments: It does the job. I have dry skin and it does help moisturize but nothing significant to justify the price. It also has a strong chemical scent that I'm not a fan of.

reviews.headline: controls oil
reviews.comments: my skin is naturally very oily, but after trying this moisturizer, it really helped minimize the oiliness, and i love the results! if you have oily skin and want to control it, i highly recommend this product. i absolutely love it and will definitely be repurchasing!

reviews.headline: Withstands the Test of Time
reviews.comments: I've been using this moisturizer for over 30 years.  I still love it.  Super hydrating and very comforting for the skin.  I have very sensitive skin, and this has always been my go to moisturizer to ensure the best result with no reactions.

reviews.headline: My old standby, always have it on hand
reviews.comments: So gentle yet so good. Softens my skin with one application

reviews.headline: Always a good moisturizer
reviews.comments: Hydrating and sensetive does what it needs to do!

reviews.headline: Very Nice Product!
reviews.comments: 59 yrs old & just started using a few Clinique products. Love the face wash & moisturizer. The Even Better foundation is wonderful as well!

faceoff_positive.comments: I first received the original version of this moisturizer over the past couple of years with other Clinique purchases and liked it ok. I have tried store brand moisturizers of many kinds and my face still would be dry in the morning. And as I age my face seemed to be getting more and more dry. I saw reviews of this new and improved version of their signature moisturizer and decided I would give it a try. It's fabulous! I don't wake up in the morning with the dry flakiness I had grown accustom to! My face is moist, not oily. It absorbs quickly without a filmy residue. Perfect for the middle aged woman in need of a serious moisturizer that works!
faceoff_positive.headline: No more dry skin!

faceoff_negative.comments: I have used Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion (DDML) for a couple of decades, and I loved it.....so why change something that doesn't need changing? I have never had any complaints and/or concerns about the outcome of my skin using DDML, but sad to say that has changed. I tried the DDML+ for the first time, and I felt like I had used Vasoline instead of DDLM (in fact, that is why I started using DDLM in the first place several decades ago, for it didn't have the feel of a greasy product on my face). I will be buying, or in other words stocking-up, a couple of bottles of the original DDLM and hope that Clinique minuses the plus out of the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion by the time my last bottle is empty....so Clinique please minus the plus out of Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion (or provide both products so Clinique loyal customers can choose the lotion that fits them best.)
faceoff_negative.headline: NEW Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+

rollup.name: Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+ For Face
